name: Furry Vore Bellies, Maws & Burps LoRA
description:
A multi-topic LoRA that can do mawshots, vore-shaped bellies and belching. No swallowing scenes, solo pred only. Anthro, feral, male, female, "SFW" and NSFW.

Trained at 768 resolution-equivalent buckets on fluffyrock-768-lion-e24an impressive WIP model which isn't on CivitAI yet. It's available for free on the Furry Diffusion discord server: https://discord.gg/furrydiffusion

Recommended strength circa 0.75.

Custom tags: borpbod - full body shots of burping characters, borphead - headshots/mawshots while burping.

Useful tags: tongue out, saliva, vore, big belly, fangs, open mouth, burping, sound effects, mouth shot, rumbling stomach, burp cloud, cloud emanata, sharp teeth, hand on stomach, spittle, gaping mouth, motion lines, burping up object, uvula, feathers, burping in face, holding belly, bone

(The Synth pictures also used my Synth LoRA, it's on CivitAI.)

modelVersions.name: FluffyRock-768-lion_v1
modelVersions.description: Trained on fluffyrock-768-lion-e24, also using the lion optimizer and LR order of magnitude lower than what I use with adam8bit.
